name: Car Parking Chaos v2.0
description:
v2.0

This took me 2 weeks of on and off coding to make, once I released it the popularity boomed on scratch hitting 150,000 in a few weeks. Find the 10 yellow parking spots

Car Parking Chaos 2 out soon!

Arrow Keys - to move

SPACE - to go faster

E - to hide mobile mode

Oh and please follow me on scratch (reevo_56)
